about.title: About Me
about.description: I am an Information Engineer and a student at a technical computer institute. I am passionate about front-end development and user experience, and I love building modern, responsive, and user-friendly websites. I have experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, and I always strive to improve my skills and contribute to outstanding tech projects.

project.title: Projects
project.project1_desc: I designed and developed a personal portfolio website using HTML and CSS to showcase my skills, projects, and information in a professional manner. The website features a responsive design, an elegant interface, and smooth navigation that provides a distinctive user experience across various devices.
project.project2_desc: This is a description for Project 2. You can change this text to describe your second project, its features, technologies used, and any other relevant information.
project.project3_desc: I developed a simple project using React and the useEffect hook to manage data loading and interactions within the application. I used useEffect to fetch data when the app starts and to dynamically update components, which helped improve the user experience and made the app more interactive.
